definition: Qiongzhou, historic name for Hainan Island 海南島|海南岛[Hai3 nan2 Dao3]
jasper/fine jade/beautiful/exquisite (e.g. wine, food)/abbr. for Hainan province
prefecture/(old) province/(old) administrative division/state (e.g. of US)/oblast (Russia)/canton (Switzerland)
Qiongzhou Strait (between Hainan Island and mainland China)

sentences.english: Lingaojiao lighthouse, located in the Qiongzhou Strait West entrance.
sentences.chinese: 临高角灯塔，位于琼州海峡西面进口处。

sentences.english: This paper, taking Qiongzhou University as an example, analyses how to use the library.
sentences.chinese: 本文以琼州学院为例，论述如何利用图书馆。

sentences.english: It is in the southern end of china, facing the mainland to the north by Qiongzhou Channel.
sentences.chinese: 它位于中国的最南端，与大陆相隔琼州海峡。

sentences.english: During his reign over Guangdong and Guangxi, Zhang Zhidong made some achievements on governing the Li nationality in Qiongzhou.
sentences.chinese: 张之洞督粤期间治理琼州黎族取得了一定的成效。

sentences.english: It is bordered by Qiongzhou Strait in the north and is facing Leizhou Peninsula.
sentences.chinese: 海口北临琼州海峡，与雷州半岛遥相对峙。

sentences.english: To implement ocw livelihood management regulations.
sentences.chinese: 本规则由琼州海峡管理处监督执行。

definition: ancient name for Hainan Island 海南島|海南岛[Hai3 nan2 Dao3]
capital of 府 prefecture (from Tang to Qing times)/prefectural seat
Dan county, Hainan
Leizhou county level city in Zhanjiang 湛江[Zhan4 jiang1], Guangdong
former southernmost province of the Chinese Empire, now northern Vietnam
Jiangzhou district of Chongzuo city 崇左市[Chong2 zuo3 shi4], Guangxi
the two provinces of Guangdong and Guangxi (traditional)
Zhuya, historic name for Hainan Island 海南島|海南岛[Hai3 nan2 Dao3]
Southeast Asia/South seas
Bianjing, Northern Song capital, now called Kaifeng 開封|开封[Kai1 feng1], Henan
capital of a country (literary)
south of the five ranges/old term for south China, esp. Guangdong and Guangxi
Haizhou district of Lianyungang city 連雲港市|连云港市[Lian2 yun2 gang3 shi4], Jiangsu/Haizhou district of Fuxin city 阜新市[Fu4 xin1 shi4], Liaoning
Liaodong peninsula between Bohai 渤海 and Yellow sea/east and south of Liaoning province/east of Liao river 遼河|辽河
Runzhou district of Zhenjiang city 鎮江市|镇江市[Zhen4 jiang1 shi4], Jiangsu
